application

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • application.Main

  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    This is used to control almost all of the main functions in the program, while also controlling the databases used by the tables.
    Since:
    November 10 2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaime Gonzalez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double addcost()
      This is used to add costs to get a total cost by checking it each product to its matching price, and then adding all of them, while returning the total.
      static double addrevenue()
      This is used to add revenues to get a total revenue by comparing each product to its matching price paid, and then adding all of them, while returning the total.
      static double addtotalprofit()
      This is used to add total profits to get a final total profit by going through each line in the RevenueProfit list and adding all of them, and returning the final value to the method that requested it.
      static double addtotalrevenue()
      This is used to add total revenues to get a final total revenue by going through each line in the RevenueProfit list and adding all of them, and returning the final value to the method that requested it.
      static void changedelivered(java.lang.String Clientname)
      This is used to set an order(s) made by a certain client to delivered by looking for his or her name in the order's and setting delivered to yes in those orders.
      static java.lang.String checkprice(java.lang.String Productname)
      This is used to check the price of a product by using its name and checking its matching price in the Products list, to return it on to the requesting method.
      static void deletedelivered()
      This is used to delete the orders that have been set to delivered by creating a copy of the list and only copying those who aren't delivered, and then equaling the original list to the copy.
      static void deleteordersline(int selectedline)
      This is used to delete a clicked line in orders by creating a copy of the list and copying all values except the clicked one.
      static void deleteproduct(java.lang.String Productname)
      This is used to delete a certain product by looking for its name and adding all products that do not match its name to a copy of the list, and then equaling the original list to the copy.
      static void deleteproductsline(int selectedline)
      This is used to delete a clicked line in products by creating a copy of the list and copying all values except the clicked one.
      static void editorders(java.lang.String[] LineValues)
      This is used to add edit an order by creating a copy of the database, copying all values that do not match the order, and then replacing the order in the list by using the edited values.
      static void editproducts(java.lang.String[] LineValues)
      This is used to add edit a product by creating a copy of the database, copying all values that do not match the product, and then replacing the product in the list by using the edited values.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void resettable()
      This is used to reset the RevenueProfit table by creating a new list that only includes the headers, and then equaling the original list to the new one.
      void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application

      • deletedelivered

        public static void deletedelivered()
        This is used to delete the orders that have been set to delivered by creating a copy of the list and only copying those who aren't delivered, and then equaling the original list to the copy.

      • changedelivered

        public static void changedelivered(java.lang.String Clientname)
        This is used to set an order(s) made by a certain client to delivered by looking for his or her name in the order's and setting delivered to yes in those orders.

      • deleteproduct

        public static void deleteproduct(java.lang.String Productname)
        This is used to delete a certain product by looking for its name and adding all products that do not match its name to a copy of the list, and then equaling the original list to the copy.

      • checkprice

        public static java.lang.String checkprice(java.lang.String Productname)
        This is used to check the price of a product by using its name and checking its matching price in the Products list, to return it on to the requesting method.

      • addcost

        public static double addcost()
        This is used to add costs to get a total cost by checking it each product to its matching price, and then adding all of them, while returning the total.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • addrevenue

        public static double addrevenue()
        This is used to add revenues to get a total revenue by comparing each product to its matching price paid, and then adding all of them, while returning the total.

      • addtotalrevenue

        public static double addtotalrevenue()
        This is used to add total revenues to get a final total revenue by going through each line in the RevenueProfit list and adding all of them, and returning the final value to the method that requested it.

      • addtotalprofit

        public static double addtotalprofit()
        This is used to add total profits to get a final total profit by going through each line in the RevenueProfit list and adding all of them, and returning the final value to the method that requested it.

      • resettable

        public static void resettable()
        This is used to reset the RevenueProfit table by creating a new list that only includes the headers, and then equaling the original list to the new one.

      • editorders

        public static void editorders(java.lang.String[] LineValues)
        This is used to add edit an order by creating a copy of the database, copying all values that do not match the order, and then replacing the order in the list by using the edited values.

      • deleteordersline

        public static void deleteordersline(int selectedline)
        This is used to delete a clicked line in orders by creating a copy of the list and copying all values except the clicked one.

      • editproducts

        public static void editproducts(java.lang.String[] LineValues)
        This is used to add edit a product by creating a copy of the database, copying all values that do not match the product, and then replacing the product in the list by using the edited values.

      • deleteproductsline

        public static void deleteproductsline(int selectedline)
        This is used to delete a clicked line in products by creating a copy of the list and copying all values except the clicked one.
